description: Erection of single storey rear extension (6.00m in depth, maximum height of 2.82m and eaves height of 2.82m)
decision_conditions: The proposed extension would extend beyond a wall forming a side elevation of the original dwellinghouse, and would have a width greater than half the width of the original dwellinghouse, in conflict with Paragraph A.1 (j) (iii) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above, are agreed and that Condition 12 (Construction Management Plan) of planning permission 21/01831/FUL is hereby approved subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.

The proposal is for widening of the dropped kerb, therefore please revise the location plan to show the red outline in the front pavement, where drop kerb will be proposed/ widened. Note: Please submit a copy of an Ordnance Survey based site location plan scaled 1:1250 with the application site outlined in red, showing at least two road frontages and a North point.
